AboutMe.ShortDescription: With five years of experience in eCommerce, I have developed a deep understanding of digital processes and user-centric solutions. My passion for technology and innovation has driven me to further qualify as a frontend developer. My goal is to create intuitive and high-performance digital products that inspire both businesses and users alike.

Skills.TechDescription: E-Commerce Manager, now expanding into Frontend Development. Skilled in building and designing web applications, with a strong understanding of digital business and agile workflows.
Skills.InterestedIn: Also, I'm interested in diving into

MainInfo.Headline: PROJECTS
MainInfo.Description: Here you will find some of my recent projects, showcasing my skills in frontend development. My work revolves around creating interactive, responsive, and user-friendly web applications that provide seamless digital experiences.

Join.Title: Join
Join.Description: A Kanban board group project that enables task management like Trello, with features for creating tasks, assigning contacts, and more.
Join.ImplementationDetails: This was a team project with four members. I was responsible for designing and implementing the registration and login logic.

ElPolloLoco.Title: El Pollo Loco
ElPolloLoco.Description: A fun jump & run game written in JavaScript. Help Pepe find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
ElPolloLoco.ImplementationDetails: The game is built using object-oriented programming in JavaScript and rendered on a canvas. Movements and collisions are handled with timed loops

Portfolio.Title: Portfolio
Portfolio.Description: A high-performance and responsive portfolio showcasing my projects and skills as a developer.
Portfolio.ImplementationDetails: Multilingual with ngx-translate, dynamic data management, and a component-based structure for scalability.
